name: Cloud Wizard
description:
Use your cloud to guide the wizard to the end!

To move the wizard: A for left, D for right, W for jump.

To move the cloud: J for left, L for right, I for up, and K for down

To attack: Hold Space to electrify, moving the cloud into enemies will kill them.

Let go of Space to strike with lightning.

You can also use the cloud as a platform.

If you are hit three times, you will die!
